definition[0]: the money that is obtained from doing something or selling something
example[0]: We sold the business and bought a villa in Spain with the proceeds.
example[1]: The proceeds of the concert will go to charity.
definition[1]: the money gained from selling something
example[2]: Allied-Signal was planning to use the proceeds from the sale of Union Texas to reduce debt.
definition[2]: the money that a business gets from ISSUING (=selling) bonds, shares etc
example[4]: San Diego will use the proceeds from the bond issue to acquire and install new police facilities.
